Name: Colorvore
About the game: Nom the colors! The rules are simple: CHROMY'S COLOR FADES OVER TIME. IF CHROMY'S COLOR FADES OUT, YOU LOSE. COLLECT COLOR ORBS THAT MATCH CHROMY'S CURRENT COLOR TO KEEP FROM FADING. COLLECTING ORBS OF THE WRONG COLOR WILL ACCELERATE CHROMY'S FADING. LARGER ORBS HAVE A BIGGER IMPACT IN RESTORING OR FADING. CHROMY'S COLOR WILL SHIFT TO A RANDOM COLOR AFTER COLLECTING AN ORB. ORBS COLLIDING INTO EACH OTHER ARE DESTROYED. PULSING ORBS FULLY REVERSE FADING. RAINBOW ORBS ALLOW CHROMY TO COLLECT ANY COLOR ORB FOR 5 SECONDS. STATIC ORBS ARE TRAPS AND WILL FADE OUT CHROMY COMPLETELY EVEN IF POWERED-UP! RUN AWAY FROM THE BLACK HOLE! IT CONSUMES EVERYTHING!!! COMPETE AGAINST THE WORLD FOR THE HIGHEST SCORE ON THE LEADERBOARDS! Like retro arcade games like this for the cost of a game's play at the arcade? Check out:
